import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import './tourcard.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,price,photo,featured,avgRating, reviews,city}=tour; return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}{" "} ({reviews.length})
{title}
) } export default TourCard
